summary.description: Tool based on the Pearson Correlation Coefficient (r-value) between the calculated and normalised by MAS 5.0 signal values of the 54613 Probe Sets of Affymetrix Human Genome U133 Plus 2.0 Array Chip from 1959 microarray data sets. Statistical Significance is estimated with Student's t-test and Bonferroni correction is used for multiple testing.
summary.name: Human Gene Correlation Analysis (HGCA)
